ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates how to add, and customize Tooltips on a 3D Chart by using the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Modifiers.Tooltip3D.TooltipModifier3D.html']TooltipModifier3D[/url] Type.
This ChartModifier3D can be added to the SciChart3DSurface via the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.SciChart3DSurface~ChartModifier.html']SciChart3DSurface.ChartModifier[/url] property, or via a [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Modifiers.ModifierGroup3D.html']ModifierGroup3D[/url]
You can change the default tooltip by setting the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Modifiers.Tooltip3D.TooltipModifier3D~TooltipTemplateProperty.html']TooltipModifier3D.TooltipTemplate[/url] attached property on a [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.RenderableSeries.BaseRenderableSeries3D.html']BaseRenderableSeries3D[/url] derived type. The Tooltip DataTemplate binds to a [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Model.ChartData.SeriesInfo3D.html']SeriesInfo3D[/url], which is the viewmodel for tooltips.
